original_text: Similarly, anyone who competes as an athlete does not receive the victor’s crown except by competing according to the rules.
korean_text: 경기하는 자가 법대로 경기하지 아니하면 승리자의 관을 얻지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Similarly, anyone who competes as an athlete
does not receive the victor's crown
except by competing according to the rules
